    • Constructor Detail

      • LeaderBoardView

        public LeaderBoardView(javax.swing.JFrame x,
                       UserDatabase DB,
                       java.lang.String previousView)
        Constructor This method takes care of the initialization of the leader board view
        Parameters:
        x - is the JFrame that will be used to display the view
        DB - is the user database
        previousView - is a string representing the previous view "Pause" or "Main"

      • LeaderBoardView

        public LeaderBoardView(javax.swing.JFrame x,
                       GameBoard myboard,
                       UserDatabase DB,
                       java.lang.String previousView)
        Constructor This method takes care of the initialization of the leader board view
        Parameters:
        x - is the JFrame that will be used to display the view
        DB - is the user database
        previousView - is a string representing the previous view "Pause" or "Main"
        myboard - is a game board that the user would like to return to after viewing the leader board
